short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks how often you visit each subreddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension tells you your Reddit habits by keeping track of what subreddits you visit on each day and how many times you visit them. Now you can see what subreddit you spend the most time on every day or in total!
Opening the homepage of a subreddit and any content under that sub count. Refreshing the page won't count but visiting the same page multiple times does!

github: https://github.com/DoubleT136/Reddit-Habit
